Dire Flower Ape

7 HP, 15 STR, 5 CHA, pummel (d6+d6)

• Huge flower-spotted ape with bony spikes jutting out of it.

• Spikes are mostly useless but ape often gets stuck in narrow spaces.

• Spots on the hide attract butterflies and other pollinators.

• Wants to get rid of spikes but has trouble communicating such.

category: monsters source: discord
